title: Disgusting and Manic
review: This seems like a combination of Paul Schrader on a bad trip with Kevin Smith.  It hates its characters almost as much as it loathes and detests its audience.  This may be art but it certainly has nothing to do with why I go to a movie house.  These characters remind me of Death of A salesman on a bad acid trip.  What a pointless waste of time and energy!
